description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. With experience in traditional and non-traditional education, he advocates for impactful and inclusive internet. yeehaa has been involved in various tech and education initiatives, including the Dutch Internet Society and Public Spaces Coalition. Currently based in Taipei, he focuses on bringing people together around common values and creating effective ecosystems. His work reflects themes of innovation, sustainability, and ecosystem design, as seen in his blog posts "Across Space And Time" and "Practice Innovation," which explore the concept of ecosystems in both biological and organizational contexts. yeehaa's courses, "Groom Your Ecosystem" and "Practice Innovation," emphasize leadership, adaptability, creativity, and purposeful design in fostering thriving ecosystems.
blurb: yeehaa: ecosystem architect, PhD, innovator. Blends education, tech, and philosophy to create impactful, inclusive digital spaces. Advocates for sustainable, decentralized systems and regenerative design in solving global challenges.
